patthana24.5:1.1: Nahetuṁ nosaññojanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu saññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana24.5:3.1: Nahetuṁ noganthaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu gantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana24.5:5.1: Nahetuṁ nooghaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu ogho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana24.5:7.1: Nahetuṁ noyogaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu yogo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana24.5:9.1: Nahetuṁ nonīvaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu nīvaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana24.5:11.1: Nahetuṁ noparāmāsaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu parāmāso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
